name: Ryvn
headline: Deploy, update, and monitor applications in customer clouds / on-prem
description:
Ryvn manages the infrastructure for your applications in your cloud or your customer's cloud. We handle deploying and rolling out updates, provide aggregated logging and monitoring, and offer one-click rollbacks. Expand into regulated industries, accelerate time-to-PoCs, and boost revenue by offering on-prem/self-hosted without the added complexity.

Build once, deploy anywhere.

### FAQs
Some questions we get asked the most
Does Ryvn allow me to deploy to my own cloud?
Absolutely, Ryvn will deploy and manage your workloads across any cloud, whether it is your own cloud or your customer's. You can have the guarantee that your services work the same across both.
Does Ryvn store any of my data or my customer's data?
Ryvn only stores metadata about your services, environment variables you've configured, encrypted secrets and any telemetry that is configured for your services. You have the option to self-host Ryvn's control plane to be in full control of any data that flows into the control plane.
Can my team also use Ryvn?
Yes, Ryvn is designed to support team collaboration with features assigning service owners, delegating permissions to release and rollback, etc.
Can I integrate Ryvn with other infrastructure as code (IaC) tools?
Yes, Ryvn works with the major IaC tools like Terraform, Pulumi, and OpenTofu. You can use those to provision your infrastructure via Ryvn.
What kind of support does Ryvn offer?
Ryvn offers email support to our Pro customers. For enterprises, we provide 24/7 support with prioritized SLAs and a private Slack channel.

### Meet Ryvn: Your Cloud Deployment Solution

**Overview**  
Ryvn is a fresh startup founded in 2024, born out of the Y Combinator Batch F24 and based in the heart of San Francisco. With a compact team of just two, Ryvn focuses on simplifying the deployment, monitoring, and updating of applications across various cloud environments, whether it's customer clouds or on-premises. Their motto? "Build once, deploy anywhere."

**Mission**  
Ryvn’s mission is clear: they aim to empower businesses to deploy, update, and monitor their applications seamlessly within their production landscapes. They strive to break into regulated markets, speed up the path to Proofs of Concept (PoCs), and ultimately enhance revenue potential.

**Key Features**  
1. **Cross-Cloud Compatibility**: With Ryvn, you can deploy on popular platforms like AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and Azure—wherever your customers are.
2. **Real-Time Monitoring**: Get notified and manage on-prem deployments from a unified interface, tackling issues before they reach your users.
3. **One-Click Rollbacks**: Simplify the management of updates with hassle-free rollbacks, ensuring a smooth user experience.
4. **Enterprise-Grade Infrastructure**: Ryvn offers robust solutions, allowing enterprises to operate with higher margins and minimized compliance risks.
5. **Integration with Major Tools**: Supports integration with infrastructure as code tools like Terraform, Pulumi, and OpenTofu, making it easy to provision and manage your infrastructure.

**Benefits**  
- **Faster Time to Market**: Launch your services without sweating the operational details.
- **Cost-effective Solutions**: Enterprises are ready to pay 3-10x more for “Bring Your Own Cloud” contracts—there's room for better pricing strategies.
- **Control Over Data**: Maintain ownership of your infrastructure, data, and code; with no vendor lock-in, you call the shots.
- **Security and Privacy**: Reduces compliance risk by keeping sensitive data in rightfully controlled environments.

**Support**  
Ryvn offers a supportive framework tailored for teams, with email support for Pro customers and 24/7 dedicated support for enterprises, including a private Slack channel.

**Join the Movement**  
If you're looking to revolutionize how you manage your cloud deployments and gain an edge in the competitive landscape, Ryvn is worth exploring. They enable you to concentrate on product innovation while they take care of infrastructure chaos.

For further details, pricing plans, or to book a demo, visit [Ryvn.ai](https://ryvn.ai).

---

This summary gives you a glimpse of what Ryvn is about and how it can help your business thrive in the cloud landscape. Whether you’re a startup or an established enterprise, Ryvn aims to alleviate the burdens of cloud management so you can focus on what you do best.
